byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and JODI RUDOREN

abstract: Three Israelis are killed and more than 20 are wounded in four attacks by Palestinians in East Jerusalem and another city near Tel Aviv.
lead_paragraph: The assaults were the most intense eruption so far in two weeks of escalating violence that has alarmed the country and flummoxed its security forces.

headline.main: Attacks by Palestinians Kill 3 Israelis and Wound More Than 20
headline.print_headline: Attacks by Palestinians Kill 3 Israelis and Wound More Than 20

snippet: The assaults were the most intense eruption so far in two weeks of escalating violence that has alarmed the country and flummoxed its security forces.
